doctor.info: Prof. Dr. A.K.M. Ahsan Habib is a Cancer Specialist in Bogra. His qualification is MBBS, DMRT, Higher Training in Cancer (China, Germany). He is a Former Professor & Head, Radiotherapy at Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. A.K.M. Ahsan Habib at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra is 3pm to 7pm (Tue, Wed & Thursday).

doctor.info: Dr. Shakera Sultana is a Cancer Specialist in Bogra. Her qualification is MBBS, MPhil (Radiation Oncology), PGT (Medicine), DMU (Dhaka).
